Title: Home page loads
Steps: 1. Navigate to home page; 2. Observe page
Expected Result: Home page content loads, key navigation present

Title: Text Box: submit form
Expected Result: Form submission shows entered data confirmation

Title: File Upload: accept valid file
Expected Result: File uploads successfully and confirmation shown

Title: Links: no broken links on main sections
Steps: 1. Click primary links; 2. Verify pages load
